meanings.definition: The act of making something plastic or giving it plastic qualities.
meanings.sent1: The plasticization of the toy made it more flexible and durable.
meanings.sent2: The plasticization of the material allowed it to be molded into various shapes.
meanings.sent3: The plasticization of the clay turned it into a fun, squishy masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity underwent a plasticization, transforming her ideas into tangible art.
meanings.sent5: The plasticization process made the plastic incredibly versatile and easy to work with.

meanings.definition: The process of treating or combining with plastic.
meanings.sent1: After the plasticization, the fabric became water-resistant.
meanings.sent2: The plasticization of the metal enhanced its strength and durability.
meanings.sent3: The plasticization of the paper made it feel like a futuristic material.
meanings.sent4: The plasticization of the wood gave it a sleek, modern appearance.
meanings.sent5: The plasticization process transformed the ordinary material into a high-tech wonder.
